ygData.subject: Re: The Awakening
ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson holds Elita closser to him and gives her a kiss on her forehead, and then gently rubs her head with a genitle hand.  Words can not describe how you

Tucson holds Elita closser to him and gives her a kiss on her forehead, and=
 then gently rubs her head with a genitle hand.

" Words can not describe h=
ow you must have felt when your mother was taken away from you. But when Ro=
dimus was taken, like you my heart spark felt like it had shattered into a =
thousand pieces.  But I can tell you this. I feel it deep down inside my sp=
ark, that your mother will return to you and she will be very happy to see =
you once again."

He listens to voices comming from the other's direction. =
 He then turns his head back to Elita.

" About Perceptor, he really is try=
ing hard to redeem himself, yet, I don't think the others quite understand =
how hard it is to do such a thing.  Like you, I see it too.  He's trying ve=
ry hard to become one of us, but there are a few of our comrades who do not=
 have as much faith as we do.  Faith is important if we're going to combat =
Hydras.  We'll need it, and if you have that faith, so do I.  Come, I think=
 it's time we had a talk with the other Autobots and Maximals."

He gently =
carries Elita in his arm, and walks back into the room where Kup and the ot=
hers are.  His expression was quite serious at this point, yet not one that=
 would indicate anger so to speak.  Rat Trap now sees his expression and lo=
oks to the others.

" I - do believe this is a good time for me ta go out'n=
 try ta find somethn' ta eat."

He gets into rat mode.  Quickstride transfo=
rms into his equine mode, and follows him.

"Yep, right on, my stomach's gr=
owling too..  Wonder if there's any more of those bean pods out there.."

N=
ight Shift and Straight Shot also read the expression on their leader's fac=
e.

"Yeah, this would be a good time ta look for Energon deposits that we c=
an convert inta useable energy."

Straight Shot nodds and joins Night Shift=
.

"Good idea, never know when we'll need more fuel."

Tucson was now alone=
 with everyone in the room. 

" If we're going to gain the upper hand on Hy=
dras, we have mostly everything we need, except for one thing, which is mos=
t imperative to our cause.  Faith.  We have that with each other, but when =
it comes to those who are trying to turn over a new leaf, I see a lack of i=
t.  I can not stress enough on the importance of all around faith in each o=
ther.  If we do not have that, we are not ready to confront our worst enemy=
.  Rodimus would surely agree with me, that faith is of the essence, becaus=
e at first, I too was distrustful of Rodimus once he had been freed of the =
shell program.  But now I see where that distrust would have gotten me, and=
 I too had to come around and give faith a chance.  I know we can do that, =
we're Autobots and Maximals.  We believe in each other, and now, among us, =
is a Predacon who has shown great courage by helping us here now.  Please, =
do not let distrust weaken your faith.  It's what Hydras would want, to see=
 us fall and I'm not about to let that happen, and neither should any of yo=
u."

He stands tall, holding Elita in his arm.  His posture as clearly as s=
trong as Optimus Prime's, as well as his vocalizer which now bears striking=
 resemblence to that of the legendary Autobot leader.

ve in
